Content: Four people who have fallen ill suddenly during a party at a hotel in Wadduwa area, have been admitted to the Panadura Base Hospital.Three of them have died. The other person is also reported to be in a critical condition. About 1,500 people have attended the party. The reports say they have come to know each other over the internet. The party has been organized by an institution in the Kaduwela area. The Wadduwa police are conducting further investigations into the incident.
